installmentsCriteria.markdownDescription: When set to `max-quantity`, the block will render the installments plan with the biggest number of installments. When set to `max-quantity-without-interest`, the block will render the installments plan with the biggest number of installments and **zero interest**. Notice that, if this prop is set to `max-quantity-without-interest`, and no installments plan matches the 'without interest' criteria, the component will fallback the default behavior.

installmentOptionsFilter.markdownDescription: Allows you to define two filtering rules that will narrow down the possible installments plans the component might render.
